animeDescription: A 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabe is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Soukaizan which he is supposed to save. In his quest to save the realm, he manages to transform a clay sculpture into a somewhat autonomous (small) Super Robot.(Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Chou Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru', 'Summary: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Soukaizan Eiyuu Densetsu']
